summary: Allows the player to receive training from anyone.*
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
Allows the player to receive training from anyone.*

*More info below.

Required Files
==============
None.

Details
=======
The player will now be able to receive training from potentially any NPC with some requirements:

	1. The NPC is not a trainer in the original game (to prevent any possible conflicts).
	2. The NPC must be at least a friend of the player (so you\'ve done a favor for him/her).
	3. The NPC must have at least one skill that is higher than the player.
	4. The NPC\'s level in that skill must be at least 50 (or whatever the journeyman skill level happens to be).

Install
=======
1. Download the file.
2. Extract the files to a temporary location.
3. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
4. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
5. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Load your game.
2. Type \"StopQuest fg109_Trainers_Quest\" into the console (without the quotes).
3. Save and exit.
4. Delete the \"Train With Anyone.esp\" and \"Train with Anyone.bsa\" files.

Upgrade
=======
1. This is the only release so far.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
1. The dialogue speeds by too fast.

	There are no sound files, so there\'s nothing to be done about it.  Try using Fuz Ro D\'oh: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14884.

2. The dialogue options don\'t show up, and I know that the NPC meets the requirements.

	The scripts controlling it might be a bit slow.  Exit dialogue, wait a couple seconds, perhaps move around, and try again.

Contact
=======
You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as \'RandomNoob\'
You can find me on TESNexus as \'fg109\'

Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
author: fg109
